name: Johnny Silverhand
summary: Iconic Rockerboy, SAMURAI frontman, and anti-corporate revolutionary. Combat veteran of the Second Central American War (Nicaragua) with extensive experience in tactical sabotage, adversary emulation, and mass-market psychological operations. Known for high-impact social engineering through chrome-rock and orchestrating the 2023 Arasaka Tower 'Night City Holocaust'. Dedicated to dismantling corporate hegemony and exposing the 'Soulkiller' program. Note: Some historical accounts may vary due to engram memory unreliability.

experience.title: Tactical Team Leader
bullets: Co-led a Militech-backed assault on Arasaka Tower to deliver a 5-kiloton tactical nuke, effectively ending the Fourth Corporate War.
Coordinated with Morgan Blackhand and Rogue Amendiares for high-stakes urban infiltration and rooftop extraction.
Executed search and rescue mission for Alt Cunningham's consciousness within the Arasaka mainframe under intense combat conditions.

experience.title: Frontman & Lead Guitar
bullets: Co-founded the legendary chrome-rock band SAMURAI, achieving international fame and platinum record status.
Composed and performed 'Chippin' In', 'Never Fade Away', and 'A Like Supreme' - anthems of the anti-establishment movement.
Utilized global tours to broadcast anti-corporate messages and shift public perception of veterans disillusioned by war.

experience.title: Infantryman
bullets: Deployed to the Second Central American War, participating in high-intensity jungle warfare and tactical raids.
Lost left arm in combat; successfully integrated a silver prosthetic, establishing the 'Silverhand' operational identity.
Exposed government corruption in the 2009 solo album 'SINS of Your Brothers' after deserting service.

education.school: Streets of Night City / Nomad Clans
education.focus: Small Arms, Survivalism, and Music Theory

awards: Ghost Story Status (Arasaka Corporation internal lore)
